title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
OB: When attempting to export multiple files with the same name but located in different directories to a zip file using the 'Zip File' option under the 'File > Export' menu, the export process fails.
EB: The export process should successfully create a zip file containing all the selected files, even if they have the same name but are located in different directories.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch WSWB (software name) and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select 'File > Export' and choose 'Zip File' to start the export process
4. Verify that the export fails and does not create the expected zip file.
